name: Draft
description: The application is still being finalised by the employee and not yet submitted.

name: Submitted
description: The leave application was submitted by the employee for review and approval.

name: Withdrawn
description: The application was withdrawn by the employee prior to taking the leave.

name: Approved
description: The leave was approved by the company.

name: Rejected
description: The leave was not approved by the company.

name: Taken
description: The leave was taken by the employee.

name: Not taken
description: The leave was not taken and recorded as such by the company.
